name: Goliath Warrior
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Mountain Born: The goliath is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.
traits.Powerful Build: The goliath counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

actions.Multiattack: The goliath makes two attacks with its greataxe or hurls two javelins.
actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
